meanings.sent1: The exocytic process helps cells release substances outside.
meanings.sent2: The exocytic vesicles fuse with the cell membrane to release their contents.
meanings.sent3: The exocytic dance of the cell was quite a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement bubbled up like an exocytic event, bursting forth unexpectedly.
meanings.sent5: The exocytic mechanism is like a hidden spring suddenly unleashed.

meanings.sent1: The exocytic pathway is crucial for cell communication.
meanings.sent2: Cells use exocytic machinery to transport molecules outside the cell.
meanings.sent3: The exocytic journey of the neurotransmitter was full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent4: His exocytic release of emotions surprised everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The exocytic process is like a secret message being delivered to the world.
